name: ZUS All Day Cup 500ml (17oz) - Aqua Collection
description: Premium stainless steel tumbler with double-wall vacuum insulation. Keeps beverages hot for 6 hours or cold for 12 hours. Features a leak-proof lid and fits most car cup holders. Part of the exclusive Aqua Collection with a sleek aqua blue finish.
care_instructions: Hand wash recommended. Do not microwave.

name: ZUS Classic Tumbler 350ml (12oz)
description: Compact and portable tumbler perfect for your daily coffee fix. Features premium stainless steel construction with vacuum insulation technology. Ideal for commuters and coffee enthusiasts on the go.
care_instructions: Hand wash only. Not dishwasher safe.

name: ZUS Travel Mug 600ml (20oz) - Boss Edition
description: Large capacity travel mug inspired by our signature Boss Blend. Perfect for long journeys and extended work sessions. Features advanced thermal technology to maintain temperature for extended periods.

name: ZUS Glass Coffee Cup 300ml (10oz) with Sleeve
description: Elegant double-wall borosilicate glass cup with protective silicone sleeve. Perfect for showcasing your beautiful coffee layers. Thermal design keeps drinks at optimal temperature while remaining comfortable to hold.
care_instructions: Dishwasher safe. Remove sleeve before microwaving.

name: ZUS Signature Water Bottle 750ml (25oz)
description: Stay hydrated throughout the day with this premium water bottle. Features a wide mouth opening for easy ice insertion and cleaning. Perfect for both hot and cold beverages with 24-hour temperature retention.
care_instructions: Hand wash recommended for exterior coating.

name: ZUS Espresso Cup Set (4pcs) - Ceramic
description: Premium ceramic espresso cup set, perfect for coffee connoisseurs. Each cup features the iconic ZUS logo and is crafted from high-quality porcelain. Comes with matching saucers for an authentic caf√© experience at home.

name: ZUS Iced Coffee Tumbler 700ml (24oz) with Straw
description: Specially designed for iced coffee lovers. Includes a reusable stainless steel straw and splash-proof lid. The tapered base fits perfectly in car cup holders while the slim design makes it easy to carry.
care_instructions: Dishwasher safe. Straw brush included for easy cleaning.

name: ZUS French Press Coffee Maker 1000ml (34oz)
description: Premium borosilicate glass French press with stainless steel frame. Brew perfect coffee at home with this professional-grade coffee maker. Features a 4-level filtration system for a smooth, sediment-free cup.
care_instructions: Dishwasher safe. Handle glass carafe with care.
